segments.text: Well Mr . Black , I appreciate your interest in our company , but I doubt you can do this job properly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sure I can do it well . I ’ Ve always wanted to be the best in whatever I did . Give me a chance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I could . But you even don ’ t have a B . A , so I ’ m sorry to say there ’ s no chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re questioning my ability ? I tell ya , I can make it ! I ’ ll talk to your boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Black , I don ’ t think my boss will talk to you . It ’ s a Chinaman ’ s chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You think so ? Let ’ s take a chance !
segments.speaker: S2
